channel.title: Network Toolkit on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Network Toolkit on Analyst

item.title: Lab Setup
item.description: Analysing Traffic Dshell Installing sudo python3 -m pip install [tar_file] # option 1 pip install dshell # option 2.

item.title: BTFM
item.description: Dshell # MacOSX path to directory with pyenv (example): /Users/[user_name]/.pyenv/versions/3.8.5/envs/python3/lib/python3.8/site-packages/dshell/ decode -l # list decoders decode -d [decoder_name] # decoder info # who talked to whom decode -d ip [capture_file_name].
